summary: Provides a unified interface for accessing raster imagery from diverse origins, offering functionality to retrieve image subsets, coordinate reference system transformations, data type details, spatial extent, and both processed and raw pixel arrays.
business_intent: Enables seamless integration of raster datasets into geospatial analysis, mapping, and machineâ€‘learning workflows by allowing developers to plug in new data providers such as file collections, APIs, or tile map services and obtain consistent image data.
